meanings.definition: The time between sunset and sunrise.
meanings.sent1: During the nighttimes, the stars twinkle in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I like to sleep during the nighttimes and wake up refreshed in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The nighttimes are when the moon plays hide and seek with the clouds.
meanings.sent4: In the nighttimes, the world is painted in shades of darkness and mystery.
meanings.sent5: The nighttimes bring a peaceful stillness to the world.

meanings.definition: The period of darkness in each 24 hours; the time from sunset to sunrise.
meanings.sent1: The nighttimes are when the world sleeps and dreams.
meanings.sent2: During the nighttimes, the city lights create a beautiful glow.
meanings.sent3: In the nighttimes, the shadows dance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The nighttimes cloak the world in a blanket of darkness.
meanings.sent5: Nighttimes hold secrets whispered by the wind.
